author: geirm
msg: Support for the new node-local introspect cache stuff.  Speed speed speed.

author: geirm
msg: Support for node-local context data introspection caching : don't do introspection every visit now, but use data from the InternalContext cache if things are hunky.

author: geirm
msg: Class to hold the data for the node-local introspection caching to restore the speed we lost when we moved the introspection activities into the parse()/runtime methods of the AST nodes.

author: geirm
msg: Moved the non-user (internal) elements out to keep it clear, and simply made it extend the new InternalContext class.

author: geirm
msg: Helps formalize the idea of using the context as a thread-safe storage unit for parsing and init-ing.  Moved the template-name stuff from Context, and added support for 'node-local context data introspection caching', to coin a phrase.
